title: Happy End of August!
author: JGray
text:
And so we move from suggestive topiary to the comedy of Theresa making funny faces. Does this comic deliver or does it deliver?

As many of you know, I'm a GM as well as a comic writer. I'm running a Pathfinder campaign set in a non-MotA setting and two of my players have asked for a second campaign to explore different characters in a different section of the setting. We need 1 to 2 more but are having trouble finding someone. We'll be playing every other week, 8:30 - 11:30(ish) Eastern Standard Time. The campaign will focus on exploration and adventure with a bit of an Indiana Jones vibe. If you're interested, let me know.

And for fun, here's something I already shared with the Patreon crowd. A magic item from Mysteries of the Arcana done up Pathfinder style!

Bubble Hop Gum

Aura faint transmutation; CL 2nd

Slot –; Price 600 gp; Weight –

Description

Bubble Hop Gum tastes great and enhances the jumping power of any athlete! To use Bubble Hop Gum for maximum jumpability, first place a stick into your mouth and chew it until it is nice and soft. Then attach the chewed gum to the bottom of your left shoe. Next, hop on your right foot two times. Finally, push off with your left foot and enjoy your Bubble Hop Gum enhanced jump!

When used according to the instructions, a stick of Bubble Hop Gum provides a +5 competence bonus on all Acrobatics checks to make high or long jumps. Afterwards the gum becomes inert and cannot be used again.

Bubble Hop Gum comes in five flavors (Jumpin' Joyberry, Bouncing Babbleberry, Happy Hopmint, Wintergreen Twitch, and Colliding Cinnamon). Each pack of Bubble Hop Gum contains ten sticks of mouth-watering delicious flavor.

Construction

Requirements Craft Wondrous Item, creator must have 5 ranks in Acrobatics skill; Cost 300 gp
